description:
Add about:flags flag for the Suggestions NTP.


BUG=none
TEST=none


Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=124780

messages.text:
LGTM, feel free to change things per my suggestions or to ignore 'em.

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/9566046/diff/1/chrome/app/generated_resources.grd
File chrome/app/generated_resources.grd (right):

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/9566046/diff/1/chrome/app/generated_resources.grd#newcode4948
chrome/app/generated_resources.grd:4948: <message name="IDS_FLAGS_SUGGESTIONS_PAGE_NAME" desc="Name of the 'Enable suggestions page' lab.">
nit: Perhaps "IDS_FLAGS_NTP_SUGGESTIONS_PAGE_NAME"?

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/9566046/diff/1/chrome/app/generated_resources.grd#newcode4949
chrome/app/generated_resources.grd:4949: Suggestions page
nit: Perhaps "NTP suggestions page?"

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/9566046/diff/1/chrome/app/generated_resources.grd#newcode4952
chrome/app/generated_resources.grd:4952: Add 'Suggestions' new tab page.
nit: Would be nice to give a little bit more information/context here.

done

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/9566046/diff/1/chrome/app/generated_resources.grd

chrome/app/generated_resources.grd:4948: <message name="IDS_FLAGS_SUGGESTIONS_PAGE_NAME" desc="Name of the 'Enable suggestions page' lab.">
On 2012/03/02 18:27:34, Ilya Sherman wrote:
> nit: Perhaps "IDS_FLAGS_NTP_SUGGESTIONS_PAGE_NAME"?

Done.

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/9566046/diff/1/chrome/app/generated_resources.grd#newcode4949
chrome/app/generated_resources.grd:4949: Suggestions page
On 2012/03/02 18:27:34, Ilya Sherman wrote:
> nit: Perhaps "NTP suggestions page?"

Done.

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/9566046/diff/1/chrome/app/generated_resources.grd#newcode4952
chrome/app/generated_resources.grd:4952: Add 'Suggestions' new tab page.
On 2012/03/02 18:27:34, Ilya Sherman wrote:
> nit: Would be nice to give a little bit more information/context here.
Add 'Suggestions' card to the new tab page, which suggests the pages to be opened.

CQ is trying da patch. Follow status at
https://chromium-status.appspot.com/cq/georgey@chromium.org/9566046/3001

subject: Add about:flags flag for the Suggestions NTP.
